item.title: Obsidian - A Pet Project Raytracer implemented in Rust and Vulkan
item.description: Obsidian Whitted Raytracer written in Rust using the Vulkan compute API Look at the source. This is a project I worked on to learn more about raytracing techniques, Rust, and Vulkan. Some notes Disclaimer: The below notes are several years old and are likely (definitely) out of date. This raytracer only renders spheres, as I’ve only implemented the ray-sphere intersection. Some potential future features could be ray-triangle intersections and handling refraction.
